com.linkedin.paldb.impl

Class StorageCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.linkedin.paldb.impl.StorageCache

  • public class StorageCache
extends java.lang.Object
    LRU cache configured on the desired size in memory.
    This cache can be configured with the following properties:
    cache.enabled - LRU cache enabled
    cache.bytes - cache limit (bytes)
    cache.initial.capacity - cache initial capacity
    cache.load.factor - cache load factor

    The cache estimates the size of the objects it contains so it consumes no more than the configured memory limit.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public <K> K get(java.lang.Object key)
        Gets the value in the cache for key or null if not found.

        If the value associated with key exists but is null, returns StorageCache.NULL_VALUE.

        Type Parameters:
        K - return type
        Parameters:
        key - key to get value for
        Returns:
        value, null or StorageCache.NULL_VALUE

      • contains

        public boolean contains(java.lang.Object key)
        Returns true if the cache contains key.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if found, false otherwise
